creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Hanging, large red silk ground entirely covered with two identical alternating bands of children in formalized landscape. The colors of costumes and landscapes vary in the different bands. At top deep border of dragons, phoenix and flowers. Green, yellow, blue and metal threads edged top and bottom with seven narrow formalized borders in pink, blue, turquoise and yellow. Six of these narrow borders repeated at the bottom. Raw edges top and bottom.
title: Panel
